member.name: T:MediaCenter.Shared.MessageInspector
member.summary: Client message inspector.

member.name: M:MediaCenter.Shared.MessageInspector.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MediaCenter.Shared.MessageInspector.AfterReceiveReply(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message@,System.Object)
member.summary: Enables inspection or modification of a message after a reply message is received but prior to passing it back to the client application.
member.param: The message to be transformed into types and handed back to the client application.

member.name: M:MediaCenter.Shared.MessageInspector.BeforeSendRequest(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message@,System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel)
member.summary: Enables inspection or modification of a message before a request message is sent to a service.
member.param: The message to be sent to the service.
member.returns:
The object that is returned as the argument of the
method. This is null if no correlation state is used.The best practice is to make this a to ensure that no two objects are the same.

remarks.para: The method writes the SOAP request to a file prior to the send.

member.name: M:MediaCenter.Shared.MessageInspector.PatchFilePath(System.String@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Patches the file path middle part with current time and message ID.

member.name: M:MediaCenter.Shared.MessageInspector.SetXmlFileVariables(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the XML file variables _lastLogHour and _lastMessageId.

remarks.para: If the task instance is just started and not handled any requests yet, the variables are reset.
If the task instance has handled requests before, the variables are checked against the last request XML file and set.
The _messageId is reset on the first request every hour in this version.

member.name: M:MediaCenter.Shared.MessageInspector.SplitFilePath(System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Splits the file path into left, middle and right part.

member.name: M:MediaCenter.Shared.Utility.IsNullOrEmptyTrimmed(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the text is null or empty when trimmed.
member.returns: true if the text is null or empty when trimmed; otherwise, false.
